A deciduous bonsai sits in the left foreground, while a juniper bonsai is in the center middle ground, and the trunk of a third bonsai is on the right middle ground. The background consists of a blurry landscape. The camera then tilts upward, causing the bonsai trees to shift toward the bottom of the frame. The movement stops to reveal the upper body of a man in the middle ground, positioned slightly to the right of center, with the top of the juniper bonsai remaining visible in the bottom center foreground. The background now shows more of the surrounding trees and a wooden structure.
